Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to respond with a detailed explanation of the business process, describing each step, purpose, gateways, convergence, loops, differences between standard and custom, conditions for approvals and rework.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Follow formatting rules: use LaTeX for math if any (likely none). Use proper paragraphs. No code needed. Ensure no mention of model unless asked. Provide thorough explanation.
